original: intros l i H. induction l as [|e l' IH]. - reflexivity. - simpl. intros H0. specialize (H e (or_introl eq_refl)). specialize (IH H0). destruct (le_dec (eIndex e) i). + simpl. rewrite IH. reflexivity. + simpl. rewrite IH. reflexivity.
